      • getDefaultClassLoader

        public static ClassLoader getDefaultClassLoader()
        Provides the ClassLoader instance. Found from Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader() or Kute.class.getClassLoader()
        Returns:
        The default classloader.

      • getDefaultProvider

        public static Resource.Provider getDefaultProvider()
        Provides a Resource.Provider that wraps around the default classLoader.
        Returns:
        A default provider that wraps a resource provider around a classLoader.
        See Also:
        getDefaultClassLoader(), getProvider(ClassLoader)

      • getProvider

        public static URLArrayResourceProvider getProvider(List<URL> urls)
        Parameters:
        urls - An array of urls where the provider can search for resources. Only jar and directory urls are supported.
        Returns:
        An URLArrayResourceProvider class that will provide all the resources in the array of urls.

      • getProvider

        public static Resource.Provider getProvider(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The classloader from which to search for resources. Currently only implementations of URLClassLoader are scanned.
        Returns:
        A Resource provider that will scan the classloader.

      • emptyProvider

        public static Resource.Provider emptyProvider()
        Returns a empty resource provider.
        Returns:
        a resource provider that returns nothing.

      • providerOf

        public static Resource.Provider providerOf(Resource.Readable... resources)
        Parameters:
        resources - A var_arg array of resources that the provider will contain.
        Returns:
        A Resource.Provider that contains all of the specified resources.

      • providerOf

        public static Resource.Provider providerOf(Collection<Resource.Readable> resources)
        Parameters:
        resources - A collection of resources that the provider will contain.
        Returns:
        A Resource.Provider that contains all of the specified resources.

      • group

        public static Resource.Provider group(Resource.Provider... providers)
        Group ResourceProviders together into one resources Resource Provider.

        Resource.Provider providerA = Kute.directoryProvider(new File("images/")); Resource.Provider classpathProvider = Kute.getDefaultProvider(); Resource.Provider provider = Kute.group(providerA, classpathProvider);

        Parameters:
        providers - The resource providers to group.
        Returns:
        A resource provider that providers resources for all the given resource providers.

        public static Resource.Provider group(Collection<Resource.Provider> providers)

      • cacheResource

        public static CachedResource cacheResource(Resource.Readable resource)
        Create a resource that cache's its response.
        Parameters:
        resource - A readable resource instance.
        Returns:
        A readable resource that will cache the contents of another readable resource, to speed things up. Use with caution.

      • findResource

        public static <R extends Resource> Optional<R> findResource(Stream<R> stream,
                                                            String path)
        Finds the first resource in stream that matches given path.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The resource implementation.
        Parameters:
        stream - A stream of resources.
        path - The path to search for.
        Returns:
        A matching resource, if found.

      • distinct

        public static <R extends Resource,X> Stream<R> distinct(Stream<R> stream,
                                                        org.slieb.throwables.FunctionWithThrowable<R,X,IOException> function)
        Type Parameters:
        R - The generic resource implementation.
        X - The generic value type.
        Parameters:
        stream - The unfiltered resource stream.
        function - A function to map resources into values that we will check for duplicates on.
        Returns:
        A stream without resource duplicates as determined by the passed function.

      • distinctPath

        public static <R extends Resource> Stream<R> distinctPath(Stream<R> stream)
        Type Parameters:
        R - The resource implementation.
        Parameters:
        stream - The resource stream.
        Returns:
        A stream that has been filtered from resources with duplicate paths.
